## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8f859f678cb85445cc8d486c034c1a9de313c92e4485d8dc546bab5be2823b71)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'react-nodes' @ 4.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
